alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Douglas and southwestern Todd Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Evansville to 5 miles south of Long Prairie. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Long Prairie around 535 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 81 and 121. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 172 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
